decks.notes: The key strategy of this deck revolves around controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card draw while utilizing Narset, Enlightened Master's ability to cast powerful spells for free. By including a variety of counterspells like Force of Will and Mana Leak, along with removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Wrath of God, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and maintain control of the board. Card draw spells like Jace's Ingenuity and Dig Through Time help ensure a steady stream of resources, while Narset's ability to cast spells off the top of the library allows for explosive plays. Overall, the deck focuses on outlasting opponents and setting up game-winning plays with Narset's ability.

This control deck focuses on leveraging Keranos, God of Storms to dominate the battlefield and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The key strategy revolves around countering and disrupting the opponent's spells while also having access to powerful card draw and selection spells to maintain card advantage and card quality. By controlling the flow of the game and utilizing Keranos as a potent win condition, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes a variety of mass removal spells and disruptive creatures to handle threats and maintain board control. The ultimate goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and creatures while maintaining control of the game.

This deck is focused on disrupting the opponent's strategy while establishing a board presence with aggressive creatures in order to quickly take control of the game. It includes a variety of removal spells, discard spells, and board wipes to keep the opponent on the back foot. The deck also features powerful creatures like Anafenza, the Foremost, and versatile cards like Birthing Pod and Sword of Feast and Famine to maintain card advantage and apply pressure to the opponent. The mana base is optimized to support the deck's aggressive strategy and provides access to a range of colors for flexibility in playing spells.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by utilizing Braids, Cabal Minion's ability to force both players to sacrifice permanents each turn. The deck includes a mix of disruptive creatures like Abyssal Persecutor and Grave Titan, along with various removal spells like Dismember and Damnation to keep the opponent's board in check. Additionally, there are powerful enchantments like Contamination and The Abyss to further hinder the opponent's resources. The deck aims to grind out value over time, utilizing cards like Bitterblossom and Phyrexian Arena to generate card advantage while locking down the opponent's resources with cards like Smokestack and Winter Orb.

The main idea of this deck is to utilize Kaalia of the Vast's ability to cheat powerful creatures into play quickly and efficiently to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive threats and disruptive spells. The deck includes a mix of removal spells, hand disruption, card draw, and ramp to control the game early on, while also including a variety of high-impact creatures such as Dragons, Angels, and Demons that can end the game quickly once they hit the battlefield. The goal is to create a strong board presence and apply pressure on the opponent, while also being able to disrupt their game plan with targeted removal and disruption spells.

This deck focuses on utilizing Marath, Will of the Wild as a powerful aggro commander. The key concept is to quickly ramp up mana using a variety of mana dorks and lands such as Gaea's Cradle, then utilize Marath's abilities to control the board and overwhelm opponents with a swarm of creatures. The deck includes a toolbox of creatures that can be tutored up with cards like Birthing Pod and Chord of Calling to adapt to different situations. It also includes cards like Survival of the Fittest for card advantage and control. The deck's strategy revolves around efficiently using mana and utilizing Marath's versatile abilities to dominate the battlefield and secure victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing Narset's ability to cast spells from the top of the library for free in order to control the game and outvalue opponents. With a mix of counterspells, removal, and card draw, the goal is to keep the opponent's threats at bay while setting up powerful plays with Narset. The deck includes a variety of versatile spells like Cryptic Command, Fact or Fiction, and Supreme Verdict to answer different situations, along with extra turn cards like Temporal Mastery and Time Warp to generate additional value. By controlling the board and maximizing the value of each spell, this deck aims to slowly grind out wins and dominate the game through strategic decision-making and careful resource management.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game through a combination of countering spells, disrupting opponents' plans, and removing threats from the board. With Thraximundar as the commander, the deck includes a variety of spells to control the board state and keep the opponent on the back foot. The deck includes a mix of counterspells, removal, card draw, and board wipes to handle a range of threats and strategies. By disrupting opponents' plans and maintaining control of the game, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and secure a victory through attrition. The mana base and card selection are designed to support the control game plan and ensure consistency in executing it.
